column3: I have done the deed which will relieve you of the wife whom you hate! I have taken the poison--all of it that was left in the paper packet
column4: which was the first that I found. If this is not enough to kill me
column5: I have more left in the bottle. Ten minutes past five.|The Law and the Lady|Wilkie Collins

column1: 05:10|I settled into a daily routine. Wake up at 4:40 am
column3: get on the train north by ten after five.|Bossypants|Tina Fey
